Articles.Content:
I too am really hyped to see this thing finished.

About the engines, the size may be an illusion due to the pics being taken in Orthographic mode. Do these pics look any better?

http://imgur.com/a/oRhVZ

That's quite a size difference. But, yeah, that looks right! I'm surprised at how different they are side-by-side.

I really like the Falcon 9 you made! Your Rodan capsule has found good use in my space program, I'm even planning on using it as Duna ascent vehicle. Delta-V wise this should work even without more fuel tanks, but I'm going to pack some extra fuel anyway. Also, I can't wait for the new IVA. Actually, why does the old IVA not work anymore?

Second stage tank complete.

To-do

-Texture interstage fairing

-Texture Second stage engine

-Texture landing legs

-Texture grid fins

-Texture first stage engines, right now they are just pure black just so it looked good for now.

-Texture probe core

-Texture decoupler

-Move to Unity

I really like the Falcon 9 you made! Your Rodan capsule has found good use in my space program, I'm even planning on using it as Duna ascent vehicle. Delta-V wise this should work even without more fuel tanks, but I'm going to pack some extra fuel anyway. Also, I can't wait for the new IVA. Actually, why does the old IVA not work anymore?

The external mesh is completely different than what the old IVA was designed for so the windows would not line up and stuff.

Edited July 13, 2015 by tygoo7

Texturing almost done, just need to finish up the decoupler, grid fins, and landing legs. You can see the decoupler right below the engine.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I decided not to do a probe core and just use the stock 2.5m one. All my texturing attempts and modeling attempts ending up looking like the stock one. And besides, I think it'll fit nicely.

I decided not to do a probe core and just use the stock 2.5m one. All my texturing attempts and modeling attempts ending up looking like the stock one. And besides, I think it'll fit nicely.

Hmm, okay, that's true. Otherwise, the texturing looks great! I'm excited about release!

Also, yay New Horizons today!

Time for the config stuff...

Hmm, okay, that's true. Otherwise, the texturing looks great! I'm excited about release!

Also, yay New Horizons today!

Thanks! Also I am excited to see even more detailed images tomorrow! That one image of it is incredible!

Edited July 17, 2015 by tygoo7
O man that is looking sharp
Man, that looks great! Something I noticed is that your parts look really Tantares-alike. I mean, that's good, I love the look of Tantares.

I love your mod, it fits perfectly with Necrobones SpaceY launchers. Here is a Falcon 9 i made and pictures of a commsat deployment mission using the Rodan.

It costs 64k from wich 52k is recovered.

Man, that looks great! Something I noticed is that your parts look really Tantares-alike. I mean, that's good, I love the look of Tantares.

Thanks! It looks like Tantares somewhat because Beale taught me a few things on stockalike texturing and I kind of like the style of his parts.

I love your mod, it fits perfectly with Necrobones SpaceY launchers. Here is a Falcon 9 i made and pictures of a commsat deployment mission using the Rodan.

http://i.imgur.com/PUZAtE8.png

http://i.imgur.com/20o0mBQ.png

http://i.imgur.com/4A1LMQr.png

http://i.imgur.com/hqdBhOR.png

http://i.imgur.com/2lhYiwT.png

http://i.imgur.com/1gr8HTt.png

It costs 64k from wich 52k is recovered.

Very cool! Glad to see people using my mod in their saves!

I love your mod, it fits perfectly with Necrobones SpaceY launchers. Here is a Falcon 9 i made and pictures of a commsat deployment mission using the Rodan.

Honestly, I think that those parts look a little bit mismatched with the Rodan. But, that's what tygoo's new launcher is for!

I'll just leave this here...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

When we get to test ?

Edit- Who needs that stuff hehe

Edited July 17, 2015 by Mecripp2

When we get to test ?

When it's a bit more playable, balanced, and has custom titles and descriptions.

Hooray! And yeah, the texture does look very Tantares-alike. (Which is perfect.) But... Um, I have one minor request. I think it'd be great to put the togglable mission flags on the Rodan and on maybe the first stage too. That way, instead of having "SpaceX" printed on it, it can say whatever the player has set as their flag!

That blank space on the top of your capsule could easily have a mission flag like where it says SpaceX in the picture! (And one on the back, too?)

Anyway, that Falcon looks awesome! I'm really excited to see how it turned out, but I'm more curious to see how it flies (and lands!). Did you get the togglable engine working yet, or is that to come?

EDIT:

I saw this picture of the internals, so... once you get around to the IVA, here's a reference.

But, personally, I'm not too big on IVAs myself. I'd rather see the Falcon finished, and then the Cargo Dragon.

Edited July 17, 2015 by Z3R0_0NL1N3

Hooray! And yeah, the texture does look very Tantares-alike. (Which is perfect.) But... Um, I have one minor request. I think it'd be great to put the togglable mission flags on the Rodan and on maybe the first stage too. That way, instead of having "SpaceX" printed on it, it can say whatever the player has set as their flag!

http://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/05/30/cf511a0b-1900-4cfa-8601-943e51f3b317/resize/770x578/0b7dab955e6532d97f80921c59bb33c2/dragon-5-of-12.jpg

That blank space on the top of your capsule could easily have a mission flag like where it says SpaceX in the picture! (And one on the back, too?)

Anyway, that Falcon looks awesome! I'm really excited to see how it turned out, but I'm more curious to see how it flies (and lands!). Did you get the togglable engine working yet, or is that to come?

EDIT:

I saw this picture of the internals, so... once you get around to the IVA, here's a reference. http://cdn.teslarati.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Elon-Musk-Dragon-V2.jpg

But, personally, I'm not too big on IVAs myself. I'd rather see the Falcon finished, and then the Cargo Dragon.

I might add a mission flag after I get the F9 finished.

Toggleable engines do work, just forgot to show it in the screenshots but there is the 9 and 1 engine modes.

Looks great so far. I have my Rodan fleet grounded while waiting for new launch vehicle.

Just a question: landing legs are part of 1st stage tank or are they separate part?

Looks great so far. I have my Rodan fleet grounded while waiting for new launch vehicle.

Just a question: landing legs are part of 1st stage tank or are they separate part?

They are a separate part you can use on other craft.

Some pics I took from another test flight, kind of messed up the landing though...

Some pics I took from another test flight, kind of messed up the landing though...

http://imgur.com/a/js0zE

That is fantastic! man i'm hyped for this.

They are a separate part you can use on other craft.

Great, thanks

Version 0.5 is available on KerbalStuff!

-Added Ghidorah 9 parts (Falcon 9)
Woohoo download and tried to give rep but won't let my great anyway will try and get you later.

Version 0.5 is available on KerbalStuff!

-Added Ghidorah 9 parts (Falcon 9)

http://i.imgur.com/FRO6RIX.png

Great! A Falcon 9 thingy! Can't wait to get my Kerbal hands on it, but I'll do that tomorrow. I have a question, actually a couple questions. First, how much liquid fuel and oxidizer ( in KSP units) should you leave in the Ghidorah 9 to safely land at the KSC? Second, what stuff will you also include in the probe pack? Third, as soon as you finish everything that's on your to-do list, can you make a stockalike Dragonrider capsule? It's basically a manned cargo dragon with Superdracos. That would be great for Duna missions, it would imitate the look of the Mars One mission.

Great! A Falcon 9 thingy! Can't wait to get my Kerbal hands on it, but I'll do that tomorrow. I have a question, actually a couple questions. First, how much liquid fuel and oxidizer ( in KSP units) should you leave in the Ghidorah 9 to safely land at the KSC? Second, what stuff will you also include in the probe pack? Third, as soon as you finish everything that's on your to-do list, can you make a stockalike Dragonrider capsule? It's basically a manned cargo dragon with Superdracos. That would be great for Duna missions, it would imitate the look of the Mars One mission.

Thanks!

First question: I am not really sure actually since all my landing attempts failed because I am not that good at efficient burns. I would say about less than 1/4 of the tank or something like that.

Second question: It is classified at the moment because some of the planned probes might not be included, so I don't want to get your hopes up.

Third question: Perhaps, after I get everything done on my to-do list.
